text: -tyutta#raM baqrq.hiSha#H prastaqra(gm) sA#dayati praqjA vai baqrq.hi ryaja#mAnaH prastaqrOyaja#mAna-mEqvAya#jamAnAq-dutta#raM karOtiq tasmAqd-yaja#mAqnO&ya#jamAnAqdutta#rOq&ntarda#dhAtiq vyAvRu#ttyA aqnakti# haqviShkRu#tamEqvaina(gm)# suvaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM ga#mayatitrEqdhA&na#ktiq traya# iqmE lOqkA EqBya Eqvaina#M ~MlOqkEByO#&naktiq na prati# SRuNAtiqyat pra#tiSRuNIqyAdanU$rddhvaM BAvukaqM ~Myaja#mAnasya syAduqparI#vaq pra ha#ra - [  ]  26
